Issue.summary: Fabric client 1.2, 1.3 and mutual TLS problem
Issue.description: My fabric network version is 1.3 (dockerfiles attached). I think there is a problem with ChannelEventHub on 1.2 and 1.3 fabric client. I have no problems with fabric client 1.1.2 version and ChannelEventHub, everything works fine.Â
